alert.note: Alert for Adams; Pike; Scioto (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 12:43AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN ADAMS, SOUTHERN PIKE AND NORTHERN SCIOTO COUNTIES THROUGH 115 AM EDT... At 1243 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located 8 miles east of Peebles, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clarktown, Lucasville, Beaver, Rarden, Otway, Wakefield, Poplar Grove, Stockdale, Minford, Elm Grove, Ladd, Portsmouth Regional Airport, Mount Joy, Bear Creek, Germany and Mcdermott. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
